questions.question: The set of all real numbers is ______.

explanations.c: There are infinite number of real numbers between any two real numbers, and they can not all be mapped to natural numbers. This can be shown using diagonalization argument.

questions.question: There are languages that can not be accepted by a turing machine

explanations.a: There are countably many Turing machines and uncountably many languages, so there are some languages that a Turing machine can not accept.
